downloadTitle: Security Update for Host Integration Server 2006 Service Pack 1 (KB2579597)
downloadDescription: A security issue has been identified in the Host Integration Server 2006 Service Pack 1 that could cause denial of service vulnerability in Host Integration Server.
detailsSection: A security issue has been identified that could cause denial of service vulnerability in Host Integration Server. You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2006 Service Pack 1 or BizTalk Adapters for Host Systems Service Pack 1.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
